word:
God wants to put the harp in your hand and the crown of gold on your head. As holy angels touch their harps, He wants you to follow, singing the 


                                    -291- 

song of triumph in the city of God. There you will see souls saved through your influence. That will be happiness.--Ms 113, 1908, pp. 1-8. ("Lessons from the Sixtieth Chapter of Isaiah," Oct. 28, 1908.) 

Released March 7, 1967.
